DRMPlugin::OpenIPMPKeyManager

DRMPlugin::OpenIPMPKeyManager Class Reference
[OpenIPMP key manager documentation.]

Uses openIPMP infrastructure to store and fetch content encryption keys. More...

Detailed Description

Uses openIPMP infrastructure to store and fetch content encryption keys.

bool DRMPlugin::OpenIPMPKeyManager::AddLicense (  std::string &  contentID,
IXMLElement *  xmlDoc
) 
 

Add license for content.

Optional tags in the XML file are:

  • ROOT.License

Mandatory tags in the XML file are:

  • ROOT.UserName
  • ROOT.UserPass
  • ROOT.RightsHostURL

Here follows an example of a correctly formatted XML document.

      <ROOT>
       <License>danijelk;2005-08-31;2006-08-31;ODRL</License>
       <UserName>danijelk</UserName>
       <UserPass>ipmp</UserPass>
       <RightsHostURL>localhost:8080</RightsHostURL>
      </ROOT>

Parameters:
contentID string uniquely identifying the content.
xmlDoc XML document.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Generated on Sat Jun 10 19:18:03 2006 for "DRM Plugin Architecture" by  1.4.2
